 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּהַל‎</span>] **verb** ==be able== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Egyptian Aramaic, [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap.A 6. 8.11</sup>+; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> compare synonym <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְכִל‎</span>); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Participle active***, usually followed by infinitive<sup>absolute</sup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּהֵל‎</span> [[Dan.2.26|Dan 2:26]]; [[Dan.4.15|Dan 4:15]] (infinitive omitted); plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּֽהֲלִין‎</span> [[Dan.5.8|Dan 5:8]]; [[Dan.5.15|Dan 5:15]].
